TopicTitle: "I've been in the KSP community for so long, I remember X"

Articles.Content:
It's a simple game.

"I've been in the KSP community for so long, I remember <x>".

For example:

"I've been in the KSP community for so long, I remember when there was a roleplay forum."

Or:

"I've been in the KSP community for so long, I remember the hype about 0.15/16/17/18/19/20/21/22/23/23.5/24/25/90"

THIS IS NOT A BRAGGING THREAD. DO NOT BRAG ABOUT REMEMBERING STUFF.

Let's begin with one that will be relatable to many people:

I've been in the KSP community for so long, I remember vBulletin.
I've been in the KSP community for so long, I remember waiting for new pages of Duna, Ore Bust.
I've been in the KSP Community for so long, I remember when GusTurbo was more active and Space Shuttles were all the rage in the Spacecraft Exchange.

I've been in the KSP community for so long, I've...

...uhh...

...*ahem*...

...

...

Lemme think...
I've been in the KSP community for so long, I actually remember seeing new posts by @Rowsdower.

I've been in the KSP community for so long, I remember the save-the-round-8-tank thingie.

Edited March 7, 2016 by ZentroCatson
I've been in the KSP community for so long, I remember the Green Iron Crown invasion.
I've been in KSP so long, That I remember when EJ was not full time!
I've been in the KSP community for so long, I remember Romfarer's Lazor Mod was all the rage.
I've benn in the KSP community for so long, I remember Capt'n Skunky's "welcome" posts on the "Welcome Aboard" sub-forums.
I've been in the KSP community, I remember the Kerbal Weekly.

2 hours ago, 0111narwhalz said:

I've been in the KSP community, I remember the Kerbal Weekly.

I actually remember that from before I made an account and I was just watching.
I've been in the Kommunity so long, I can still remember when people would debate whether it was community or kommunity. I can remember Spaceport, and the big controversy over Curse.
I've been in the community for so long, I remember @Mulbin's Munbug IX!
I've been in the community so long, I remember when Bobcat was making the early HOME series parts.
I remember the old trick of putting metal plates between Mainsails and Jumbo-64 tanks to prevent the Mainsails from exploding due to overheating.
I've been in the community so loAAAAAAAAAAAAA we must rep green iron crown because somehow he acquired evil negative rep for some reason and ive always wanted it but ive never known how to get it!
I've been around so long that I remember the original forum software. The one before vB.

1 hour ago, Red Iron Crown said:

I've been around so long that I remember the original forum software. The one before vB.

What was it?

7 minutes ago, CAKE99 said:

What was it?

I don't remember the name of the software, just that it changed over in the summer of 2012 (with some similar issues as the most recent migration, some stuff got garbled). I do remember the look and feel of it, though.

I've been around not that so long that I remember reading thoose book once in my life:

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Whipping_Star & https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Dosadi_Experiment

the fun thing is that i was searching for this caracter within the story: Fannie Mae - Caleban (and it's related model sheet/cara design)

i got this link instead: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fannie_Mae

(basically in the Herbert story Fannie Mae, is a star (personnified as a human being) that can talk to human and see them as line that intersect or intersect not each other, this being have a little influence on lines direction and heading at some point, i found this caracter model sheet/cara. design pretty interesting within the stories)

I also remind the curse event mess and all related total mess as well threads, and arguing heavily with curse pr ; ) well we crossed our road a way or another and today i remind ; ) (also this made me thought each time i join some forums around the net i get chain banned whatever, weird, sub forum is a nice place for people like me ; )

 

Edited March 12, 2016 by WinkAllKerb''
I've been in the community so long I remember the hype about 1.1.
I've been in the ksp community so long I remember joining 1 1/2 months ago and over posting making tons of forum gamers annoyed!
I remember seeing the first post on orbiterforum.

On 4/17/2016 at 2:31 PM, max_creative said:

I've been in the ksp community so long I remember joining 1 1/2 months ago and over posting making tons of forum gamers annoyed!

I remember this. You kept ninja'ing my posts, as I recall....
